agent.name: Special Collections Research Center, The George Washington University

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Preservation copy: The mule driver in the foreground is Benjamin (Bennie) G, Garrish (still living) driving the mule that is towing Capt. Denton (Dent) Shupp's boat. The mule driver in the background is George Williams driving the mule that is towing Capt. Henry (Hen) Preston's boat. The boats are just below Lock 44 at Williamsport and are about to enter Lock 44 to be raised to the upper level on the way to Cumberland to be loaded. November 19

mods.mods:note: Special Collections Research Center, The George Washington University, 2130 H Street NW, Washington, 20052, United States of America (https://library.gwu.edu/scrc/contact)

div.LABEL: Preservation copy: The mule driver in the foreground is Benjamin (Bennie) G, Garrish (still living) driving the mule that is towing Capt. Denton (Dent) Shupp's boat. The mule driver in the background is George Williams driving the mule that is towing Capt. Henry (Hen) Preston's boat. The boats are just below Lock 44 at Williamsport and are about to enter Lock 44 to be raised to the upper level on the way to Cumberland to be loaded. November 19
